concept-wr.title: Image Metadata
concept-wr.shortdesc: You can use image metadata to adjust access to host resources for a VM when the VM is launched, or when it is running.

conbody.p: new topic for restructuringThe nova image-meta command is used to apply metadata to an image.
The glance image-update command is used to update image metadata after it has been applied.
For specific examples and parameters, refer to the documentation for managing a specific resource.
